textPashto: د هر کار پیل سخت دی
translationEn: The beginning of every task is hard
meaning: Starting something new always seems difficult, but persistence makes it easier.

textDari: گرگ پیر از گله دور می‌افتد
textPashto: زوړ لیوه  له خپلو ګله لرې کېږي
translationEn: The old wolf falls away from the pack
meaning: Those who are no longer useful are often abandoned by the group.

textDari: دوستی در وقت سختی امتحان می‌شود
textPashto: دوستي په سختو حالاتو کې ازموینه کېږي
translationEn: Friendship is tested in times of difficulty
meaning: True friends are those who stand by you when things get tough.

textPashto: زموږ څخه دی چې زموږ باندې دی
translationEn: It is from us that is upon us
meaning: We are responsible for our own fate
Time is precious and should be used wisely.

textDari: از مرگ نه، بلکه از زندگی بی‌هدف بترس
textPashto: د مرګ نه، بلکه د بې هدفه ژوند څخه وېرېږه
translationEn: Do not fear death, but fear a life without purpose.
meaning: Living a life without meaning or purpose is worse than death itself.

textDari: درختی که ریشه ندارد، نمی‌تواند رشد کند
textPashto: هغه ونه چې ریښې نه لري، وده نشي کولی
translationEn: A tree without roots cannot grow
meaning: Without a solid foundation, growth is impossible.

textDari: آب که یک بار از دست رفت، باز نمی‌گردد
textPashto: اوړی چې یو ځل تښتي، بیرته نه راځي
translationEn: Once water is lost, it doesn't return
meaning: Time and opportunities, once lost, cannot be regained.
Understanding yourself is the first step toward wisdom.

textDari: به زودی همه چیز تغییر می‌کند
meaning: No situation is permanent, everything changes with time.

textPashto: تر ټولو ګرم محبت، تر ټولو سړه ارامتیا راوړي
translationEn: The warmest love brings the coldest rest
meaning: The greatest sacrifices often lead to the deepest peace.

textDari: شجاعت مقابله در برابر ترس است
textPashto: زړورتیا د وېره پر وړاندې ده
meaning: Being brave means confronting and overcoming fear.

textDari: کسی که خود را می‌فروشد، همیشه از آنچه که خود دارد محروم است
textPashto: هغه څوک چې ځان پلوري، همېشه له هغه څه محروم وي چې لري
translationEn: One who sells themselves is always deprived of what they have
meaning: Losing your integrity means losing your true worth.

textPashto: تر ټولو لوی دښمن، خود انسان دی
meaning: Our own fears, doubts, and weaknesses are often our biggest obstacles.
Don't settle for less, always aim for greatness.
